title: raama ika
sahitya:
rAmA ika nannu brOva rAdA daya lEdA shrI



anupallavi



tAmasambu jEsitE ika tALanu palarunu vEDanu



caraNam



Aru shatruvulanu baTTi hatamu jEsi pUrvArjita ghOra pApamulanu

bOgoTTi nE jEsinaTTi

 nEramulanu manninci nIvE kAva valenu gAni vErevarunnAru shrI

venkaTEshvara dayAkara
